reviews.text: Switches are made of cheap plastic. Two switches already cracked into half within 3 months. You can see the second one that is breaking in the picture. It looks nice and fancy, but quality is very bad. Switches are bulky, cannot fit more than one in a 3 prong. Disappointed, will not suggest to anyone!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Slide Dimmer Switches, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: We decided to change all the switches for our LED lights into the dimmers, and we sorely regretted the Bestten choice. Some dimmers work normally, approximately 6-7 out of 25. Some dim, but only halfway, and some don't dim at all. We trusted the high number of stars and nice reviews, but this product is very problematic and should be avoided. It is less expensive than some other brands but not worth it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2024
reviews.title: All over the place

reviews.text: HORRIFIC - electrician had to replace 7 out of 10 of them. Maybe these were 2nds or just super old. But after the electrician installed them, 6 of the 15 stopped working in less than a week. So on next electrician visit he spent 90 min ($100+) replacing those 6. Therefore 11 out of 20 were/ are good. 11 of 20 had to be installed then removed. EXTRA LABOR !!! The electrician is a friend since 2013 and does impeccable work. DON''T RISK BUYING THESE. These caused me weeks of delay for my simple upgrade idea plus about $90.extra in labor.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Slide Dimmer Switches, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: We went cheep and installed 20 of these switches in our remodel. It was a big mistake. 4 did not work at all out of the box and then another one blew up and shorted the breaker. By blew up I really mean a large pop with a light show inside of the switch. This alone was enough to ruin any confidence we had in the switch. Now couple this with dimmer slides getting stuck one 2 more and dimmers simply not working on another 4. To show you how dumb we are we ordered another 10 pack to replace bad switches with more bad switches. We are going to replace all of them with another brand. They are all being sent back when the new ones come in. I only wish I could bill Bestten for the cost of the electrician.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.title: These are the worst....

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Slide Dimmer Switches, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: This switch did not work with my LED lights. They caused a constant buzzing sound. Will see if I can return them. Unfortunately my contractor lost 2 of the original boxes that the switches came in.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
reviews.title: Does Not Work With LED Lights Properly - Buzzing

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Slide Dimmer Switches, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Installed these in a 8,000 sqft home. The first night, the lights flickered when using the dimmers. The electrician said it was the dimmers. I didn't believe it so I called for a second opinion. They blamed the dimmers. The 2nd electrician even went as far as installing Lutron on an entire panel (there are 2 in the house) and every switch worked perfectly fine. He then showed me the dimmers and half of the switches were broken. That part could be because of him but, I'm not totally sure at this point honestly. More so than that, both electricians made me listen to the noise... When these switches were on and dimmed, they made a buzzing noise. They told us it was dangerous and that we shouldn't sleep in the house until the dimmers were all switched out as they could start a fire. You get what you pay for in this case.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.title: Buyer Beware. Very Dangerous!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 10 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Slide Dimmer Switches, Compatible with Dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent and Halogen Bulb, Neutral Wire Not Required, 120VAC, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Don’t buy if you have more than 1 dimmer. I spent $300 on these summers and they all make a buzzing sound or cause flickering. I also tried contacting customer service but there is no way to reach them. I now have 30 dimmers in my garage with no use. I wouldn’t buy it again if given the chance.

reviews.text: Le prix est vraiment intéressant par rapport aux grandes marques dans les magasins et c’est certifié CUL, ce qui m’a donné le goût de l’essayer. Cependant, à l’installation (par un électricien) , cet interrupteur a la difficulté à fonctionner lorsqu’il est a la luminosité bas. Il clignote ou il ferme complètement même si l’interrupteur est ouvert et ouvre subitement après 5 minutes. Dans la luminosité haute à moyenne, ça marche très bien. Mes lumières sont des DEL réglables encastrés. Je ne voulais pas prendre de chance et les a retourné pour acheter un interrupteur Lutron qui a réglé ce problème.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on December 22, 2024
reviews.title: Fonctionnel dans la haute luminosité
